definitions.meaning:
[uncountable ] ( sometimes disapproving) 
the buying and using of goods and services;
the belief that it is good for a society or an individual person to buy and use a large quantity of goods and services 
消费；消费主义（认为高消费对社会和个人有利）

examples.content:
consumerist values 
消费主义的价值观

They have clearly embraced Western consumerism.
他们显然完全接受了西方的消费主义观念
